transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: ha abhi ek mahine se date pata hai na february wale do bar generate hote hain
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji
Customer: ji Atul sir very good evening kaise hain aap
Customer: badhiya hai
Executive: badhiya sir actually Kunal ji manager baat kar rahi thi wo already aapka concern open hua tha sir services se related by lead inquiry ko leke to maine socha aap se ek bar discussion kar kya issue aa raha hai sir aap mujhe bataiye ek bari
Customer: mam discussion kya mam aapne group banwaya tha group me humne message kiya uska koi reply nahi hai
Executive: sir group me maine dekhiye na Kunal by lead to aapko bhej raha hai matlab ha beech me I understand ki aapko nahi bhej paya tha
Customer: mam humko ye bataiye group kab bana hai group hamare khyal se diwali se pehle bana hai
Executive: mai batati hu ki group kab bana tha to group jo aapka bana tha sir 11 tarikh ko bana tha ha october me bana tha 11 tarikh ko ban gaya tha theek hai yaha pe by lead aapko bheji nahi thi 15 tarikh tak to fir maine waha pe aapko dekho maine waha pe tag kiya tha usko fir 16 tarikh se aapko by lead jane lagi hai aap dekho 16 ko hi aapko itni sari by lead aayi hai aur 16 ke baad agar mai batau
Customer: mam uske baad humne usme likha hai ki jo sign up ke liye bar bar mobile number mang raha hai wo kya hai maine pucha bhi
Executive: kyunki chutti ho gayi thi
Customer: link open karne ke baad usme mobile number mang raha tha wo pucha gaya maine isme message bhi kiya
Executive: mobile number lekin mobile number lekin kyu mangega sir aap jab karenge aapke pass mobile app nahi hai kya
Customer: mam mobile app hai lekin mobile number mang raha tha maine Kunal ji ko wo bataya bhi tha wo cheez wo diwali ke baad humne bataya tha
Executive: achcha ye mujhe group me to nahi dikh raha ek minute rukiyega
Customer: maine jab usme likha tha group muh dekhne ke liye bana hai tab usme lead aana shuru hui thi
Executive: nahi nahi sir uske pehle bhi aapne sirf likha tha ki mam group dekhne ke liye bana hai kya fir maine waha pe tag kiya tha fir waha se aapko by lead jani shuru ho gayi thi lekin ha us by lead pe aapka koi reply bhi nahi aaya tha ki ha particular jo bhi aapko cheh saat by lead gayi thi usme kya revert hai theek hai bas ek aapne mujhe bheja hua hai number jo mai dekh pa rahi hu usme aapne sirf ek log ka number bheja hua hai jispe aapne bola tha ki aap ek bar baat kar le ye eric ka order hai baat karne ka baat karne par koi jawab nahi hai ye ek aaya tha aur by lead aapko cheh saat gayi thi almost usme se sirf ek ka hi aaya tha
Customer: mam usme jo mam humne jo Kunal sir ko bataya tha ki by lead by lead me wo bag wali bhej rahe hain bag mirror wali means hamari hai ki hum bore pe print nahi karte shopping wale
Executive: ha ha bataiye bataiye
Customer: shopping wale usme hum karte hain humne usko jo lead kholi hai jo unhone bheji thi abhi kal parso usme humne khola tha wo usme bori bag print ke liye bol raha hai usme
Executive: kya bol raha hai sir bori
Customer: mam jo ek kapde ka hota hai wo kapde wala nahi hai mam wo dusra wala jhola hai
Executive: okay okay theek hai
Customer: to hum wo wala hum nahi karte hain
Executive: koi baat nahi mai ek bar ek bari mai aapke samne hi kuch by lead check kar leti hu ek minute dijiyega mujhe aur baki mai ek bar ye cheez samjhati bhi hu ek bar Kunal ko ki aapko kis tarike ka by lead bhejna hai kyunki obviously waha pe agar aapke matlab ka nahi rahega to koi matlab nahi hai mehnat karne ka hamara bhi
Customer: matlab matlab hai hi nahi mam jab itna hua jab parso humne fir se complaint ki to fir se wo phone aana shuru ho gaya
Executive: wo hamari team se koi matlab nahi hai
Customer: mam mam aap parso humne aapko call kare the aapka phone switch off aa raha tha pehli cheez dusri cheez hai Kunal sir hamare jo jo whatsapp number me hai usi kiya tha
Executive: aap mujhe group me message dal dete sir kyunki usse sirf mera whatsapp chalta hai uska calling number nahi hai aap mujhe bolte
Customer: mam wo hume nahi pata tha
Executive: koi nahi aap message to drop kar sakte the na ki aapka call switch off aa raha hai
Customer: mam wo aapki baat sahi hai mam mam ek cheez bataiye mam ki agar humne isme kuch lagaya hai to humne to dekhne ke liye to nahi lagaya na hum agar isi me agar hum jute rahenge ki har samay hum complaint karte rahenge karte rahenge to hum jo offline kam kar rahe hain usme hum kaun dekhega hamara to aath mahina to nikal gaya na
Executive: bilkul aapki baat sahi hai sir mai usi
Customer: mam aath mam aath mahina mam nikal gaya aath mahine me teen manager aa gaye hamare kam hamara to jo kam tha main kam tha wo to nikal gaya hamara
Executive: sir dekhiye mai us cheez ke liye mana nahi kar rahi hu ki aap complaint mat karo ya fir aapko issue hai to hum usko resolve nahi karenge mai yahi keh sakti hu sir ki ha mai by lead bhejna start abhi bhi rakhungi aap waha pe consume karke aap particular agar aapko wo wrong bhi bhej rahe hain na to aap waha pe particular by lead ke niche na reply kiya kijiye jaise ek by lead aapke pass aayi uske niche reply pe ja ke reply kar dijiye ki not answered hai not relevant hai ya fir client ko chahiye nahi theek hai wo cheez aap waha par mention kar dijiye recording hai to aap recording bhej dijiye kyunki particular fir mai us basis pe hi concern open kar paungi right aur mai aapka yaha par matlab mai abhi check bhi kar rahi thi jaise school ID cards aapka ho gaya to school ID cards me mai check kar rahi thi kuch west bengal ki by lead thi bhagalpur bihar ki thi telangana ki thi to aise matlab multi
Customer: mam usko hum sara aapko number de dete hain hamari baat jo bhi hui hai unhone kisi ne bhi hum reply nahi kiya hai
Executive: jo matlab by lead humne group me aapko bheji hai aap uski baat kar rahe hain sir
Customer: mam high card ka mam aapne kaha bheja hai
Executive: nahi nahi mai bata rahi hu aapko ji ji mere pass abhi show ho rahi hai sir nayi by lead jo abhi push hui hai nayi nayi
Customer: mam group me bheja hai
Executive: ek ghante pehle nahi nahi group me nahi sir mai apne director page se bata rahi hu ab agar aap mujhe bolenge ki ha mujhe ye wali by lead group me dal dijiye to mai ye dalungi jaise school ID card ka hai par abhi ek acrylic ID card ka cheh ghante pehle bhagalpur bihar ka show kar raha hai cheh saal purana buyer hai india mart pe aap mujhe kahenge ye link mai aapko dal dungi theek hai iske alawa
Customer: dal dijiye mam acrylic ID card se lanyard se related mam isko to mam dijiye na mam yahi to hamara thoda main kam hai jo chalega yahi chalega
Executive: ye dekhiye ye dekhiye by lead check kijiye koi nahi mai abhi thoda is group me involve hoti hu sir actually wahi hai sir ki already hamare pass dekhiye already bahut sare clients hote hain dekhne ke liye aur waise agar account manager aapka hai to particular unke pass kuch limited company hoti hai
Customer: mam wo aapki mam wo mam aapki bilkul baat sahi hai mam aapke pass rehta hai to hum bhi to yaha wo off time offline usme kam leke baithe hain mam jo aap bhejenge usko dekh ke usko
Executive: ye open kijiye sir sorry to interrupt you ye open kijiye by lead aap ek bari aap mujhe ye jo
Customer: short out to hum bhi karenge na mam usko hume bhi to time chahiye
Executive: ye dekhiye ek bari link open kijiye maine bheja hai bataiye kam ki hai ki nahi to fir
Customer: mam link nahi khul raha
Executive: link khul nahi raha hai
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: dono pe nahi aa raha
Executive: khul hi nahi raha hai aapka link
Customer: mam link khul gaya hai lekin wo us pe kuch show nahi kar raha
Executive: ek kam kijiye india mart ka mobile app kholiye aap
Customer: mam india wahi khul raha hai mam kitne piece ka hai ye bhagalpur ka
Executive: bhagalpur wala usme piece ka likha hua nahi hai sir usme sirf requirement likhi hui hai jo niche maine dusra wala aapko diya hai na samli uttar pradesh wala usme 65 piece ki requirement likhi gayi hai ID card kitna hai 65
Customer: 12 saal purana buyer hai
Executive: aapko card rate pata nahi aaya hua hai abhi to isliye mere ko lag raha tha ki abhi panch minute pehle hi aaya hua hai to hamare pass chances jyada hai usse baat karne ka
Executive: theek hai
Executive: open kiya kya aapne
Customer: mam hume baat karne ke liye mam fir apna sara kam rok dena padta hai
Executive: sorry sir
Customer: mam baki kam karne ke liye aur kam rok dene padte hain
Executive: to inse baat kare mam
Customer: sorry
Executive: inse baat kare
Executive: ha jo maine aapko bheja hai screenshot aap uski baat kar rahe hain na
Customer: ji
Executive: ha ek bari baat kariye unse call karke
Executive: theek hai line pe rahiye
Executive: ha line pe hi mai ek bar baat kijiye
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain,
Customer: sir good evening sir
Customer: good evening ji sir ye aapka india mart se acrylic card ka requirement aaya tha
Customer: ha ji sir ye kya aapki quantity hai sir
Customer: sir abhi to 65 card hai matra 65 sir aur bhi hai kya sir
Customer: fir aage wo school ka kam chalta hai jab aate hain hamare bahut sare ji ji jab to 15 20 hazar I card bante hain retailer hai kya sir aap
Customer: ha ji retailer hai school se ha hum school se I card banate hain achcha ji ye ban jayega sir aapka
Customer: kitne ka banega hello ha ji sir ban jayega sir aap kitne ka banega sir aur ye jo size hai 5 by 3.5 inch ka hai
Customer: 5 by 3.5 wahi sir card jo bante hain acrylic ka wahi to banega matlab are sir jab normally I card bante hain acrylic ke iska acrylic size ki baat hai na size iska 5 by 3.5 inch hai na
Customer: 5 by 3.5 inch hmm achcha ji ban jayega sir data kaise denge sir data to maine sheet tayar kar rakhi hai A3 ki ji mil jayega sir mil jayega
Customer: hello ha sir mil jayega sir kitne ka sir complete chahiye na sir ha complete with lanyard maine lanyard ka bhi design wagera sab set kiya hua hai ye aapko sir 32 me pad jayega mahanga bata rahe ho kahan se baat kar rahe ho sir hum Ayodhya se baat kar rahe hain Ayodhya se thoda sa bhi nahi man payega sir hamara ji Ayodhya se hamara thoda sa bhi nahi man payega kahan se bol rahe hain sir aap mai shamli ban jayega sir usme 30 tak de denge sir dekhta hu mai baat karke batata hu ji batata hu aapko sir kam achcha rahega koi kam karana chahe to dekh lijiye direct printing karte ho ya wo testing wala hai card aapka nahi sir wo direct wala hota hai na sir jaise hote hain acrylic card me thickness wale aap kya bhejo aap apna matlab ek do card bhejo achi quality wala achcha sir theek hai na whatsapp pe bhej do isi number pe theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Customer's phone was switched off.

- Group is sending irrelevant bag leads.

- Mobile number is being asked again for sign up.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the buyleads in front of customer.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive asked to reply under the buylead.

- Executive shared new bylead details.

- Executive connected customer to the buyer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with the buyer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, group, mobile app
